document_data.mainbody:
ackpurse Lane was a prominent border road located in the city of Waterdeep.
Lackpurse Lane served as part of the border between the Dock Ward and Castle Ward. It originated on Belnimbras Street in the east, branching northwest before passing due west past Dretch Lane before turning south to end on Sail Street near the waterfront. The road was intersected by the Reach, Net Street, Eel Street, Sakiirs Street, Wards Way, and Cook Street.
The Grey Griffon tavern was located on Lackpurse Lane on the west side of the intersection with Eel Street.
